/Plugins/PSMS/Statuses/NotRunning:
Connection error!
E_PSMS_NOT_RUNNING
Check if PSMoveService is running, working and accessible by clients.
/Plugins/PSMS/Statuses/NoJoints:
No controllers found!
E_PSMS_NO_JOINTS
Check if any controllers are connected, and if PSMoveService is working properly.
/Plugins/PSMS/Settings/Contents/Dim: If you're using PSMS for rotation tracking only, you can dim controller LED lights to save power.
